website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy child-sized chair with a storage drawer. Decorated with plenty of Minnie Mouse artwork.
pros: Chair with built-in desk area is perfect for drawing and coloring
Kids love the colorful graphics all over the chair, which features a scratch resistant finish
Includes a cup holder and a drawer under the seat for storing art supplies
cons: Can be difficult to put together
Will not work for school-age children

customer_reviews.title: My 2 two year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and the perfect size for my 2 year old. There's a little storage bin that she puts coloring books in or toys. She uses the cup on the desk for her crayons. It looks just like the picture and came as described with all parts included. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Synthia Sniff

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Athe desk is fine but the crayon holder in pink came broken with a crack that can hurt you. I need a replacement cup. This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Nicosia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grand daughter fitsfine and has room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: sherry l lashley

customer_reviews.title: My great granddaughter gives this a 👍
customer_reviews.text: Had a friend assemble it and it took him a good hour to put it together. Love the storage bin underneath. My great granddaughter is crazy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Yve B.

customer_reviews.title: I was super impressed with the shipping time. It came faster than the estimated delivery time.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this desk/chair combo. She loves Minnie Mouse so it was a no brainer. It’s sturdy and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for little ones!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves eating, reading and coloring in her new chair.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for granddaughter. She loves this great sturdy desk.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: The tray at the bottom for storage
customer_reviews.text: Baby Elleven use the seat all the time for everything even when she using her tablet
customer_reviews.author: sandra Teamer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as strong as I expected to hold a child that's 45 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken cup
customer_reviews.text: I love the desk. It came with a broken cup and there is no back piece to stop the storage box from sliding out.
customer_reviews.author: sadonna

product_meta.title: Disney Chair Desk with Storage Bin Minnie Mouse Characters Desk Set Fabric Storage Bin Seat Extra Storage Table Desk Chair MDF Construction Assembly Required Sits Low Children Furniture
product_meta.description:
Your toddler will love to color, play or study using the DISNEY CHAIR DESK WITH STORAGE BIN.

This kids' desk and chair set are adorned with images of Minnie Mouse, and it also has an image of Daisy Duck on the side. With a flat surface to work on, this Minnie Mouse table and the chair are an ideal workspace for doing homework, reading, or drawing. This Disney Desk and Chair comes with a storage bin that fits under the seat. This storage bin in the kids' desk and chair set can hold all of the storage supplies that your child needs on a regular basis while keeping supplies organized in a neat manner. Easy to access, the bin slides in and out from under the seat. Stationary items such as pens, pencils, and crayons fit in the included cup holder. 

Product Details

-Disney Desk and Chair for toddlers measures 23.5" long x 20.5" wide x 21.5" high.
feature_bullets: This DISNEY CHAIR DESK WITH STORAGE BIN has a pull-out, fabric storage bin fits perfectly under the seat for extra storage.
It has a cup holder provides space to store pens, pencils or a drink.
Made from MDF construction, this DISNEY CHAIR DESK WITH STORAGE BIN and contains no lead.
This children chair desk with storage meets all the ASTM safety standards.
Recommended for 18 months up to 5 years of age this DISNEY CHAIR DESK WITH STORAGE BIN.
